definitions.meaning:
~ sb 比…活得长
to live longer than sb

examples.content:
He outlived his wife by three years.
他比妻子多活了三年。

definitions.meaning:
~ sth（在…结束或消失后）继续存在
to continue to exist after sth else has ended or disappeared

examples.content:
The machine had outlived its usefulness(= was no longer useful) .
这机器已无用了。
